name: NANO (Chloe Elford)
description:
This game uses keyboard controls.

The Game

Have you ever played Cyberpunk 2077 and been disappointed with the experience? If yes, “wake the *@?# up samurai” and play Nano instead! Traverse the land with your push and pull abilities, solving the puzzles because “we’ve got levels to burn”.

The Team

A game made by:

  • Yulia Robertus (ITCH page)
  • Chloe Elford (ITCH page).
